scripts.start: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Terminal" to keystroke "t" using command down' -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "compass watch" in selected tab of the front window' -e 'delay 3' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Terminal" to keystroke "t" using command down' -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "./bin/server" in selected tab of the front window' && ./node_modules/.bin/webpack
